TITLE: Including Flux Assets in Blade Layout
DESCRIPTION: Adds the `@fluxAppearance` and `@fluxScripts` Blade directives to the application layout file. These directives include the CSS and JavaScript assets required for Flux components to function and render correctly.
SOURCE: https://github.com/livewire/flux/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<head>
    ...
    @fluxAppearance
</head>

<body>
    ...
    @fluxScripts
</body>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting up Tailwind CSS with Flux styles
DESCRIPTION: Configures Tailwind CSS to include Flux's default styling. This involves importing both the Tailwind CSS base styles and the Flux CSS file into the `resources/css/app.css` file. It also defines a custom dark variant.
SOURCE: https://github.com/livewire/flux/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: css
CODE:
```
@import 'tailwindcss';
@import '../../vendor/livewire/flux/dist/flux.css';

@custom-variant dark (&:where(.dark, .dark *));
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Flux using Composer
DESCRIPTION: Installs the Livewire Flux package using Composer. This command retrieves the necessary files and dependencies to integrate Flux into your Laravel project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/livewire/flux/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
composer require livewire/flux
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Optional: Adding Inter Font Family
DESCRIPTION: This snippet adds the Inter font family to the layout file, which is recommended for a consistent look and feel with Flux. It links to the Google Fonts CDN to load the Inter font with weights 400, 500, and 600.
SOURCE: https://github.com/livewire/flux/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<head>
    ...
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.bunny.net">
    <link href="https://fonts.bunny.net/css?family=inter:400,500,600&display=swap" rel="stylesheet" />
</head>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Tailwind to use Inter Font
DESCRIPTION: Configures Tailwind CSS to use the Inter font family.  The `--font-sans` variable is set to 'Inter, sans-serif' within the `@theme` block, applying the Inter font to the default sans-serif font stack.
SOURCE: https://github.com/livewire/flux/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: css
CODE:
```
@import 'tailwindcss';
@import '../../vendor/livewire/flux/dist/flux.css';

...

@theme {
    --font-sans: Inter, sans-serif;
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Publishing Flux components via Artisan
DESCRIPTION: Publishes the blade files for specific Flux components using the `flux:publish` Artisan command. This allows developers to customize the components by modifying the published blade files.
SOURCE: https://github.com/livewire/flux/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
php artisan flux:publish
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Flux package via Composer
DESCRIPTION: Updates the `livewire/flux` and `livewire/flux-pro` packages to the latest version using Composer. This ensures that the application uses the most recent features and bug fixes available in the Flux library.
SOURCE: https://github.com/livewire/flux/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
composer update livewire/flux livewire/flux-pro
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Activating Flux Pro license via Artisan
DESCRIPTION: Activates the Flux Pro license using the `flux:activate` Artisan command. This command prompts for the user's email and license key to unlock the Pro features of the Flux library.
SOURCE: https://github.com/livewire/flux/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
php artisan flux:activate
```
